description: Array containing a breakdown of the income received for foreign property by country code for the retrieved tax calculation.

incomeSourceId.title: incomeSourceId
incomeSourceId.description: The unique identifier of the income source.

broughtForwardClass4LossesUsed.description: The total sum of Class 4 National Insurance Contributions losses brought forward from earlier years that have been used against the Class 4 National Insurance Contributions for the business for the tax year of the calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.
